column1: # The January 1921 reading is an estimate and has been omitted.
# The January, May, July and August 1931 readings are estimates and have been omitted.
# The January and February 1940 readings are part estimates and have been retained.
# The May 1941 and May 1943 readings are estimates and have been omitted.
# The July 1946 reading is part estimate and has been retained.
# The January, February, August and December 1954 readings are estimates and have been omitted.
